examples: It's very easy to get frustrated in this job.
Es muy fácil frustrarse en este trabajo.
His apathy just made her even more frustrated.
Su apatía la hizo sentir aún más frustrada.
They felt frustrated at the lack of progress.
Se sintieron frustrados por la falta de progreso.
He stamped his foot in frustrated rage.
Golpeó con el pie con furia frustrada.
